about_the_game:
MEET HILDA!

Age: 37 years old

Zodiac Sign: Sagittarius

Preferences: Rough sex, BDSM, orgies, cunnilingus.

A classic achiever, Hilda always aspired to build a career in the Peacekeeper Forces, often advancing by any means necessary. She's accustomed to commanding not only her subordinates but also those around her. A workaholic, she lives solely for her job and career, compensating for the lack of normal relaxation with steamy sex orgies.

WHAT YOU'LL GET

From now on, Hilda will not only be your reliable companion but also your inspiring muse! She will always accompany you on the main screen with her dynamic animations and engaging dialogues.

By purchasing this DLC, you'll get Hilda as a mascot. You can change the mascot anytime by opening your profile and selecting the "Mascots" tab.

Additionally, you'll receive 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

And most importantly, you'll gain our eternal gratitude! Thank you for considering purchasing this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot Hilda
short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, Hilda, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
